column4: just did apt-get install firefox-3.5 installed fine but icons still start up old version...
i dunno just did apt-get install firefox-3.5
if i run firefox-3.5 in term it opens the correct firefox version but my menu icons load old version
how can i set the command "firefox" to the new version?
how did you install the new firefox?
is this from an official ubuntu source?
i know where its at and i can run it but do i really have to edit the menu shortcuts to firefox-3.5 instead of firefox?
in general what you're looking for could be managed with update-alternatives, but I'm not sure firefox is installed that wy
try sudo rm /usr/bin/firefox && sudo ln -s firefox-3.5 /usr/bin/firefox
awesome thanks that did the trick
